nodes.text: Rae Carson is the author of "The Red One," a short story which appears in the anthology From a Certain Point of View, celebrating the 40th anniversary of Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope, about R5-D4. She has also written "Hear Nothing, See Nothing, Say Nothing," a novella in the anthology Canto Bight.
Carson also wrote the Solo: A Star Wars Story tie-in novel Most Wanted, which was released in concert with the film.

Carson later wrote Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker: Expanded Edition, the novelization of Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker, published on March 5, 2020 in the UK and March 17, 2020 in the US.
